name: Make The Whole World Dance
content: 一百分得一两分也不必太上心
心酸一两分钟不必想太深
We can make the whole world dance
We can make the whole world dance
伤者有几伤心暗恋总痛过心
即使初恋得一次也至少铭心刻骨
We can make the whole world dance
We can make the whole world dance
We can make the whole world dance
We can make the whole world dance
We can make the whole world dance
We can make the whole world dance
